idea:
The company will be creating multiple digital platforms to bring in a large population to indulge in equity and trading markets. This would be achieved by building training contents, information portals and gamification of trading processes. The company hopes to introduce masses to trading and financial businesses and enhance their wealth generation capabilities.


Majority of Indian’s does not trade in equity, commodity and financial markets because they do not understand the nuances of trading. We hope to build platforms to educate these masses to take the first step towards trading. The company hope to start a lot more professional and casual traders which will benefit the equity market as well as contribute to the country’s economy.


The company shall launch multiple mobile applications which will have necessary training and knowledge contents. We are also building trading simulators for customers to try various trading techniques without putting money in stock markets.


The internet has lots of training materials, however none gives a simulated and gamification view of the equity market. Our solution shall give customer a simulated hands-on experience of the trading practices.
name: CAPITAL FLASH FINTECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Automoto focuses on quick service cum automotive care and addresses the entire range of vehicles

from two-wheelers to commercial trucks. (Refer to Attached)

Automoto's medium to long-term strategy would cover value-added services such as Insurance, IoT,

connected vehicles, and analytics around automobiles.

Further, electric vehicle battery swaps and charging stations are built into the plans to become

future-ready today.

The core of the model involves an asset-light rapidly scalable business using franchisees, partnering

as required with Automotive OEM, having robust processes, and enabling the last mile omnichannel

client connectivity.

Problem: Multiple Players in the market today cater different direct and allied services to the

Passenger vehicle segment.

Solution: Automoto's MOTO365 chooses to be the one-stop solution for all automotive needs for

both consumers and Enterprises.

Segments: Insure-Tech, full-stack cloud mechanic garage Management, Fintech, Auto-tech,

Automotive AI & Machine Learning Key Differentiation: Multiple vehicle management solutions with

IoT cum content first Motorplace.

The major thesis that revolves around our offerings is to ensure the right customer experience,

playing a vital role across the adoption of all the verticals.
name: LUBBY AUTO VENTURES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We have some catching up to do with the world when it comes to the sophistication of our travel gear. The world is exploding with amazing products designed specifically for globetrotters, which are setting new standards in design, aesthetics and functionality. Bragpacker has been conceived as a platform to bring the very best of travel gear, globally, to Indian consumers. At the same time, we also believe that this pre-travel shopping does not need to be expensive and wasteful. Hence, we are introducing different usage models for our customers that allow them to access the best products without killing their travel budget

We know that packing for a trip can be a stressful and time consuming exercise that can take away from the best part of travel – the anticipation of hitting the road. No longer. With Bragpacker,
name: T-LAB TRADECOM PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: z foods is a food-based startup. We conduct online cake baking courses to help develop a more entrepreneurial mindset in India. To promote entrepreneurship. Teach people the basics of cake baking and decorating. Explaining them the business aspects as well.

idea:

JPMM media content owners to easily monetize their Video/Audio content beyond the borders of traditional advertising. We do this by offering a self-service white label platform, using which media content owners can launch their own Multi-Screen Video and Audio Streaming (Live & On-Demand) platform in a matter of just a few minutes and at ZERO upfront investment.
